attributes.additional_details: Needs to be a sentence if your found with a balaclava or ski mask a sentence is given as the only reason they would be worn would be to attack or commit robbery
attributes.background: Ban the ski masks and balaclavas too many of our children are being attacked and robbed because they are ok to wear in public places

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647362
